item.description:
Come and join us for the SITZ OLDIES DANCE!!

"THE CRAB SHACK BAND" noted for great vocals, a band that 'tears it up' with songs like Sweet Home Alabama, Crimson and Clover, House of the Rising Sun, Some Kinda Wonderful, Bobby McGee, Oh Darling!    From 9 PM to Midnight
 
"Darnell Clark" a well-known 'Oldies Songs Soloist' will start us rocking from 8 to 9 PM 

Wear oldies attire or dress casually

Light buffet with plenty of munchies. Cash bar!

There is a charge of $25 (for guests)...PAYPAL is NOT accepted at this event.

See you there!! Enjoy!! THIS IS ALWAYS A FUN EVENT!!

 

Directions:

Take 95 North (128) to exit 31B (4/225) Bedford (near Lexington). Follow 225 west toward Bedford

Go pass D'Angelo's and across from McDonald's is the American Legion Hall. Look for the SITZ signs out front.

The hall is just before the CAR WASH sign on the left.

Parking is in the back. You can also park in D'Angelo's.

If the above lots are full, you can also park in the lots for Stop and Shop, Home Goods, TJ Max and Staples. Just walk around Friendly's back along the sidewalk, pass the Car Wash and onto 357 Great Road.

EVERYONE MUST ENTER THROUGH THE FRONT DOOR!!
item.name: "Oldies Dance"
